name: @syngrisi/e2e
description: End-to-end Playwright BDD test suite for Syngrisi.

scripts.kill: (pkill -9 -f syngrisi_test_server || true; pkill -9 -f playwright || true; pkill -9 -f chromium || true; sleep 3 && echo 'Killed all test processes') || true
scripts.test: yarn kill && bddgen && run-s -c test:clean-blob test:parallel test:flaky test:combine-blob test:merge-reports test:stats; say 'all tests done'
scripts.test:clean-blob: rm -rf reports/blob-parallel reports/blob-sso reports/blob-flaky reports/blob-combined reports/playwright-report reports/report.json
scripts.test:combine-blob: mkdir -p reports/blob-combined && cp reports/blob-parallel/*.zip reports/blob-combined/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp reports/blob-sso/*.zip reports/blob-combined/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp reports/blob-flaky/*.zip reports/blob-combined/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.test:smoke: yarn kill && bddgen && run-s -c test:clean-blob test:smoke-fast test:smoke-flaky test:combine-blob test:merge-reports test:stats
scripts.test:headed: bddgen && cross-env SYNGRISI_LOG_LEVEL=warn PLAYWRIGHT_HEADED=1 playwright test --project=chromium --grep-invert '@flaky'
scripts.test:mcp: cross-env SYNGRISI_LOG_LEVEL=debug E2E_HEADLESS=1 MCP_IDLE_TIMEOUT_MS=15000 MCP_IDLE_CHECK_INTERVAL_MS=3000 playwright test --workers=1 --config support/mcp/playwright.config.ts --grep-invert '@flaky'
scripts.test:mcp:headed: cross-env SYNGRISI_LOG_LEVEL=warn PLAYWRIGHT_HEADED=1 playwright test --workers=1 --config support/mcp/playwright.config.ts --grep-invert '@flaky'
